column5: Heading up to erie  for two weeks  does anyone have a current walleye report from there. Thanks

Not sure what part of the western basin you are going to fish but here is my report from Colchester to Leamington. HOT HOT and HOT. I have been running Northland crawler harnesses with a #4 or 5 Rainbow blade. I have been fishing many different depths from 12-35 fow and doing well.
